channel.title: Music – 에이제이(AJ)

item.title: 에이제이(AJ) - 눈물을 닦고

This song for love
to have her back
Man do it for love
to get her back
You know I’m saying
OK let’s go

item.title: 에이제이(AJ) - 2009(Feat.현아)
item.description:
You know
what it is
It’s time to
introducing ma man AJ!
I can try and
I can climb and
I can
shine and
I’ll be sittin’
on the top
I can try and
I can climb and
I can shine and
you better feel me now
내가 나올 줄
아무도 몰랐지
날 보고 사람들은
모두 다 놀라지
조금씩
그대들의 시선을 느껴
침 좀 닦고
높이 손들어
When I say
wave your hands
You need 2
흔들어 손
I can promise you
우린 뭔가 다르다는 걸
When I say
bounce like us
You need 2
흔들어 몸
날아올라 나와 같이
touch the sky
I tell you
what boy
난 처음부터
차원이 달라 boy
You’re not
on my level
I’m so hot like
(Wonder Girls)
He can jump like AJ
remember his name AJ
He’ll be champ
so go get the CD
On your pay day
날 따라올 수 없어 man
I’m so fast
like shot gun
누구보다 강해 I’m so
strong like hogan
날 위해 달궈진 무대
뜨거워 like hot sun
(If you got a balls)
자신 있음
Call me
come & get some
I got you low low low
you gotta say what?
Blow down below
low low
Blar blar blar blar
I got you low low low
(이 멋진 순간)
2009 AJ comin’ up!
I got you low low low
you gotta say what?
Blow down below
low low
Blar blar blar blar
I got you low low low
(이 멋진 순간)
2009 AJ comin’ at ya!
